name: Truck simulator (itch) (Infinitegames.studios)
description:
Truck simulator (itch) (Infinitegames.studios) is an adventure-simulation game developed by Infinitegames.studios. It came out on 24-05-2022.
Truck simulator (itch) (Infinitegames.studios) is available on Android. The game is sold via itch.io.
